main event: A reported UFO sighting involving an object with a rounded nose and a pointed tail observed in Las Vegas, Nevada in September 1954.
interesting points: The observed object changed color from black to bright orange., The object was seen during thunderstorms and cloud cover., The length of the observation was less than a minute., The sighting was made from a location at 3395 ft elevation., The reliability of the witness observation is noted as unknown.
sighted object: one ball-shaped object, possibly a balloon or aircraft
witness description: Billy, atomic electronics supervisor, reliability unknown
